title: What is this toxicity? !
body: So I heard about Ocean Week and was like, what the heck, lets give that a try. So I made a OCE smurf. Holy shit, bad decision. I thought NA was supposed to be bad but that was like a gentleman's club compared to this. How do you people play like this... =.= So yeah, people, I'm going home to NA, hope RIOT sorts this out soon because I feel bad for you guys.

replies.body: the solution is simply this community should be nuked, wiped the %%%% off the map
